message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity for you to acquire something that's worth $10000 to you. I'm willing to let it go for $9500.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm not quite willing to go as low as $7500. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $8500. It's a fair price considering the value the product holds for you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $8000 for the product. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
